TEXT.TITLE: LOUISIANA WEEKLY CROP REPORT
TEXT.BODY: The Louisiana weekly USDA state crop report said there were 2.4 days suitable for fieldwork. Soil moisture supplies rated 41 pct adequate and 59 pct surplus. Winter Wheat - fair to good condition. eight pct headed vs 27 pct a year ago and 17 pct average. Corn - eight pct planted vs 64 pct a year ago and 51 pct average. two pct emerged vs 45 y/a and 23 avg. Spring Plowing - seventeen pct completed vs 66 pct a year ago and 48 pct avg. Reuter
